author: Bellular News
description:
Everyone says gaming is dying. The data says something worse - we've been stuck since 2021. While commentators scream about the next 1983, they're missing what's actually happening to the $184 billion industry that can't grow anymore.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

00:00 Yup, Things Have Changed
00:51 What IS A Crash?
03:09 A Decade Of Success
06:09 THAT Crash Can't Happen Again
09:58 What's Really Happened
12:16 Funding Has Collapsed
14:59 Change Is The Only Constant

Sources:
